snippet: A Dell special committee has encouraged Michael S. Dell to raise his offer. | The Commodity Futures Trading Commission is divided over a plan to rein in lucrative trading by banks overseas. | The Fed approved rules intended to make banks more...
abstract: A Dell special committee has encouraged Michael S. Dell to raise his offer. | The Commodity Futures Trading Commission is divided over a plan to rein in lucrative trading by banks overseas. | The Fed approved rules intended to make banks more resilient to losses. | The Koch brothers want to be seen as major players in deals.

headline.main: Pressure to Raise Offer for Dell
